𓋹 𓍑 𓋴 may he live, be prosperous and healthy, LPH , sss , ccc, etc
𒁲𒈠𒃶𒈨𒂗 šilim-ma hé-me-en: (lit. "may you be healthy/prosperous") => Welcome, farewell
